price: Je! Mnabishana naye kwa aliyo yaona?
footnotes: Hivyo nyinyi mnamkadhibisha Mtume wa Mwenyezi Mungu na mnabishana naye kwa aliyo yaona kwa macho yake?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

translations: Then will you dispute with him
